Administratively, Haicang is part of Xiamen but geographically, it is distinct. It is West of downtown on the mainland, connected to Xiamen island by a bridge. There is a

in the Xiamen article. However, unlike some other mainland suburbs, Haicang is not yet on the Xiamen BRT (bus rapid transit) system.

It the last few years, Haicang has been growing quickly. There are many new buildings, many of them highrise and some quite luxurious.

, often have a stop in Haicang en route to Xiamen.
Qingjiao Ciji Palace, or the East Palace, was built under the Southern Song Dynasty in 1151 for the great doctor Wu Ben; he and several generations of his disciples taught there.

value: content=One of the most beautiful resorts in Xiamen. Besides the regular accommodations, the resort also contains an exotic hot spring park. They have all sorts of flavors (like milk, rose, tea, etc.) mixed into their natural hot spring water. They also have a fantastic spa. It is worth a trip.
